Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Harlem (O'Hare). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Harlem (O'Hare). 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
